strats.name: Pseudo Plasma Spark Out Left
strats.note: Charge near node 2 then climb up and spark out of the left door.

strats.name: Pseudo Plasma Charge Out Left
strats.note: Charge near node 2 then climb out and carry the spark through the left door.

strats.name: Bug Room Charge Out Left
strats.note: Charge below then climb up and carry the spark out of the left door.

strats.name: Bug Room Charge Out Right (Gravityless)
note: Charge below node 1 then carry the spark through the morph tunnel and out the right door.
This is a lot trickier without Gravity because the tide must be timed correctly.

strats.name: Bug Room Charge Out Right (Gravity)
note: Charge below node 1 then carry the spark through the morph tunnel and out the right door.
This is easier with Gravity because the tide won't interfere.

canLeaveCharged.note: mustOpenDoorFirst is false because the door can be shot before initiating the spark.

to.note: It's not clear whether the risk of falling into the water pits should count as water navigation. We went with yes for now, mostly because dealing with the Menus at the same time is not trivial.

strats.name: Maridia Bug Room Frozen Menu Bridge
note: Freeze one of the bugs (called Menus) in a position where you can use it to get into the morph passage.
That allows passage without having to gain height while being morphed.

strats.name: Maridia Bug Room MidAir Morph
note: This probably needs to be behind a tech as well?
With Gravity, it's possible to move forward and mid-air morph into the morph passage.
The momentum can push Samus into the tunnel, no need to press forward while in mid-air.

to.note: It's not clear whether the risk of falling into the water pits should count as water navigation. We went with yes for now, mostly because dealing with the Menus at the same time is not trivial.

strats.name: Naked Watering Hole Escape
strats.note: A stationary spinjump can put Samus into a situation where she can slowly infinite walljump to freedom.

nodes.name: Top Junction
nodes.note: This exists mostly in case it ends up being helpful for handling walljumps later

strats.name: Plasma Spark Fish Climb
note: Doesn't actually require stepping on two successive Skulteras.
Doable by standing on the left edge of the top ledge and crouch jump + downgrabbing on the top fish.

strats.name: Bug Sand Room Suitless HiJump (L to R)
Bug Sand Room Suitless Frozen Bridge (L to R)
Bug Sand Room Suitless Kill Yapping Maws (L to R)
Naked Bug Sand Room (L to R)
Bug Sand Room Space Jump (L to R)
strats.note: Requires shooting the door in midiar, otherwise water is involved.

strats.name: Bug Sand Room Suitless HiJump (R to L)
Bug Sand Room Suitless Frozen Bridge (R to L)
Bug Sand Room Suitless Kill Yapping Maws (R to L)
Naked Bug Sand Room (R to L)
Bug Sand Room Space Jump (R to L)
strats.note: Requires shooting the door in midiar, otherwise water is involved.

bypassStrats.name: Botwoon Skip
bypassStrats.note: The 2 hits enemy damage on the bypass is pretty much a worst-case scenario where the next-to-last Zoa you kill doesn't give you energy.

to.note: This link refers specifically to crossing on frozen enemies. Failing here will lead to a softlock

strats.name: Suitless
strats.note: HiJump logically required to move here suitless, as you need it to get back out if you're not arriving at the node from the sand chute

to.note: This link refers specifically to crossing on frozen enemies. Failing here will lead to a softlock

strats.name: Suitless
strats.note: HiJump logically required to move here suitless, as you need it to get back out if you're not arriving at the node from the sand chute

to.note: Failing here without gravity or hiJump will lead to a softlock
Failing here without gravity or hiJump will lead to a softlock

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: One walljump on the left before a diagonal spark.

to.note: Only the the direct shinespark. Other strats should go 1 -> 2 -> 3.

strats.name: Maridia Elevator Room Wall Climb
strats.note: The walljumps are considered tricky only if the Rippers are not killed

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: To avoid redundant requirements, obstacle must be destroyed by going to 2 and back.

nodes.name: Middle of Room with Standing Pirates Dead
nodes.note: Intended to logically separate killing the standing enemies (who have actual requirements) from climbing out of the room.

obstacles.name: Pink Pirates
obstacles.note: Enemies that must be cleared to unlock the room. Take note that the wall pirates do not have special immunities.

strats.name: Plasma Room Pseudo Screw
strats.note: The 4 standing pirates take 2 Pseudo Screws to kill, so Samus must take 4 hits.

strats.name: Plasma Room Spark Clear
strats.note: Killing the pirates with shinesparks requires 4 sparks that total about 100 frames.

to.note: Passing through 3 would not be strictly required to reach 1, but it's needed to unlock the room and there's no logical reason to come back a second time.

strats.name: Frozen Wall Pirate Plasma Escape
strats.note: It's possible to climb up with just ice by freezing the lower wall space pirate (who can be frozen and killed without Plasma).
